attributes.action: No more refugees in this country! Stop them coming in!
attributes.background: This is to stop more refugees coming in the country.  It is s burden on the tax payer!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107117

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
